import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { Fragment, useState, forwardRef, useImperativeHandle } from 'react' const ModalResume = forwardRef((props, ref) => { let [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) function closeModal() { setIsOpen(false) } const openModal = () => { console.log("Clicked") setIsOpen(true) } useImperativeHandle( ref, () => { return { openModal: openModal }}, ) return ( <>
{/* This element is to trick the browser into centering the modal contents. */} ​
Payment successful

Your payment has been successfully submitted. We’ve sent you an email with all of the details of your order.

) } ); export default ModalResume
